entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
